path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - NextVisionCapital Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: The `scatterTokens` function can't work
findings.description: The team should update the interface and rewrite the `scatterToken` function.

findings.title: Attacker can transfer native tokens from the contract without any limitation
findings.description: The `scatterEthers` function doesn't check the `msg.value`, allowing an attacker to drain the contract balance by calling this function with total values lower than their balance.

findings.title: Mismatch data constant with comment.
findings.description: In `NextVisionCapital` contract, the `PRICE` constant is declared with `1000 ether` value but commented as `1 BUSD`, which may lead to a mistake.
